Product title: Utopia Towels 12 Pack Cotton Washcloths Set, 100% Ring Spun Cotton, Premium Flannel Face Cloths, Highly Absorbent and Soft Feel Fingertip Towels, Beige, Plum, Sage Green, Navy
Availability: Only 10 left in stock - order soon.
Key Features: Wash Cloth Set - The pack comprises of 12 washcloths towels each measuring 12 by 12 inches. | Terrific and Life Long - The towel set is weaved with 100% ring spun cotton making them attractive and convenient. | Offers a Comfy Experience – The towels are fabricated to offer a luxurious feel in daily household chores, at the gym, at the spa, at the pool, or simply placed in the guest bedroom. | Supple And Absorbent – The texture of the towel is soft and delicate on the skin while the composition enables it to be highly absorbent and durable. | Quality Tailored Just For You – To prevent unforeseen color discoloration, it is advised, to avoid the removal of the application of any form of cosmetics, facial creams, or scrubs directly with the towel.
comment 1: It's simple. These are luxury items at a ridiculously fair price. Every time I use one (And I use nothing else now that I have them) I feel like I am in a luxury hotel or a resort or something. They are so soft and absorbent, big enough to wrap me in comfort and luxury but not too bit for the washer and dryer. They look like a rich person's towel, they feel like it too and they dry amazingly quickly. There is nothing not to like about these towels. And if they ever wear out (Which I doubt they will do for a long long time), I will buy them again. - John
comment 2: I was surprised and impressed with the quality of these cloths. They are not the typical thin cheap cloths or the microfiber cloths. These cloths are soft yet nice and thick but not as thick as a bath wash cloth. They are perfect for residential kitchen use. You won't be disappointed with these cloths. - Diane MacKay
comment 3: ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️As a frequent buyer, I’m very happy with these Utopia Towels washcloths. They’re soft, absorbent, and hold up well after multiple washes. Great quality for the price, and the 24-pack is super convenient. I’ve reordered and would definitely recommend them. - Obie Cintron
comment 4: So far so good. I can’t believe an entire pack did not shed in the wash! I always hesitate when washing new towels or bedding because of the lint factor. This had very little shedding. It was amazing to wash cloths are a good size they do the job I use them nightly for washing my face. I do wish that the smaller packet had come in a purple because I would’ve scooped that up. I don’t know what I would do with a large amount of washcloths I don’t need that many.These are sturdy wash cloth that wash up well and do the job other than the color. My preference is to have a thicker washcloth and these definitely are mid range thin. Not see-through but not thick. I like the size. Reserving these for face wash they do show some staining from make up. Because they are white and I’m not one to continually scrub and bleach washcloths. - Ann&Earl
comment 5: Got these to replace our old ones. They are great. Soft, good quality, and exactly what we were looking for. We use them as reusable paper towels and these are great quality and don’t burn easy, which is great when they get used in the kitchen. And they are way more absorbent than the average paper towel and much softer on the skin. - Rukkia
